Name: Maximum Velocity
About the game: Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story. Drive the way you want to. Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.
